title: BRIEF-Taiwan's Innolux orders machinery equipment from Canon for T$578 mln
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's Innolux orders machinery equipment from Canon for T$578 mln Sept 4 
* Says orders machinery equipment from Canon Inc for T$578 million ($17.75 million) 
Source text in English:
